plot: A heart warming and comedic look at a unique father and son relationship. Documentary director Bryan Friedman reunites with his long-estranged bodybuilding Father, 59-year-old "Grandmaster"...
title: The Bodybuilder and I
plot_es: A heart warming and comedic look at a unique father and son relationship. Documentary director Bryan Friedman reunites with his long-estranged bodybuilding Father, 59-year-old "Grandmaster"...
plot_en: A heart warming and comedic look at a unique father and son relationship. Documentary director Bryan Friedman reunites with his long-estranged bodybuilding Father, 59-year-old "Grandmaster"...
